title: Is AzureNum a free app?
text: Yes, AzureNum is complete free, doesn't have any hidden charges and Ads.

title: Does AzureNum collect user data?
text: No, It doesn't collect any user data.

title: Do I need internet to run AzureNum?
text: No, You don't. AzureNum is a offline app.

title: Is AzureNum Sudoku always has only one correct answer?
text: Not really, sometimes it has multiple correct answers.

title: How to play Sudoku?
text: Use numbers 1-9 to fill in a 9 times 9 spaces, and you can't repeat numbers within the row, column or square (3 times 3 spaces). You will understand it when you give it a try.
